item.content:encoded: 'Degrade, Disrupt, Deceive': U.S. Talks Openly About Hacking Foes http://t.co/0gyL8eyU There was a time, not all that long ago, when the U.S. military wouldn't even whisper about its plans to hack into opponents' networks. item.content:encoded: MannyVillarC5 Bigfoot Hoaxer Killed in Accident http://t.co/KKRsdnAk From Yahoo! News: A Montana man was struck and killed by cars Sunday night while trying to hoax a Bigfoot sighting. The Montana Highway Patrol reported that Randy Lee Tenley of Kalispell was pronounced dead at the scene on U.S. Highway 93 south of Kalispell after being hit by two cars consecutively. Link - Trackbacks
